title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Feb 4 2022
description:
Pelosi to Olympic athletes: Shut up and dribble in China. Clay says, "What it really takes, what true bravery would require is speaking truth when you have a risk involved." NBC's Savannah Guthrie spreads Chinese communist propaganda during opening ceremony. We have to admit, sooner or later, Buck says, that China is "essentially a mafia state." Biden regime floats Putin false flag conspiracy. C&B praise Virginia mom who blasts school board on mask mandate hypocrisy. Biden's lame and untrue attacks on gun rights.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
